jobDescription: Are you interested in the changing media landscape? Are you interested in how social media impacts people’s relationships with companies and brands? Do you enjoy using science and data to understand human behavior? If so, we have an internship opportunity to learn and gain valuable real-world experience in online analytics.JOB RESPONSIBILITIES•Conduct quantitative and qualitative research that guide our client’s communications and marketing strategies •Create data visualizations (e.g., PowerPoint and chart templates, interactive charts, info graphics, etc.) •Participate in team brainstorms to discuss how research insights translate into actionable client recommendations •Stay informed about client industries including their technologies, products, target markets and competitors REQUIRED SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS•Must have completed Junior year of college with a 3.5 GPA or higher •Must have (or be working towards) a degree in natural or social sciences, business, marketing, communications, applied mathematics, statistics, or computer sciences •Strong writing and presentation skills, solid analytical bent to turn data into insights •Experience with Microsoft Office tools (PowerPoint, Word, Excel) •Excels at research and possesses excellent writing skills
